title: Yoga/Barre Studio, Chef's Island and Gas Cooking
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 975 Sq.
When it comes to apartment rentals in The Prescott at Concord, there’s really just one choice.
With our one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment and town home floor plans, you will surely find a space that suits your needs.
Whether you want to play, relax, or gather with friends,The Prescott at Concord Apartments provide countless options with uncommon community amenities at every turn.
Relax beside a sparkling pool, enjoy the warmth of an outdoor fire pit or play a game of bocce ball as you unwind after a day of work.
Enjoy the perks of life at a residential community that offers a bark park, children’s playgrounds, and private garages and storage spaces.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.

Expansive Balcony or Patio, Chef's Island and Gas Cooking, Free Outdoor Parking, Optional Den or Loft with Volume Ceiling, Granite Countertops, Panoramic Picture Windows and Wooded Views, Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home, Rentable Attached Garages Available, Custom Cherry or Bird's Eye Maple Cabinets, Spacious Walk-In Shower with Rainfall Showerhead, Stainless Steel Appliances, Smoke-Free Community, Light-Filled, Open Floor Plans, Wood Finished Flooring in Kitchen and Foyer, Two Story Townhomes with Attached Garages

Private Garages and Storage Spaces, Four Terraced Grilling Areas, Minutes to Concord and West Concord T Stations, Yoga/Barre Studio, Wi-Fi Enabled Resident Lounge with Entertainment Kitchen, Billiards and Gaming, Fitness Studio, Private Community Swimming Pool with Sundeck, Highly Sought-After Address in Premier School District, Outdoor Fire Pit, 2 Playgrounds, Bark Park, Business Center with iPad, Mac, and PC Workstations
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
Pet rent is $65 for dogs and $50 for cats.
Please call for complete pet policy information.
This apartment is part of the Massachusetts 40B Affordable Program.
